question: Test cross in Pea plant is
choices: A cross between $F_2$ tall plant and recessive parent
A cross between $F_2$ dwarf plant and recessive parent
A cross between $F_2$ tall plant with dominant parent
explanation: A test cross involves crossing an individual with a dominant phenotype (whose genotype is unknown, e.g., an $F_2$ tall plant) with a homozygous recessive parent to determine the genotype.
